channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Smartest Thing I Ever Did: Women on Life-Changing Decisions
item.description: This post highlights inspiring stories from women who took calculated risks, reshaped their lives, and redefined success on their own terms.
